man, sometimes this whole linux thing is: is there a linux emotional support group somewhere
it used to be more frustrating :)

You should try some older distro like old Red Hat.. and then installing some programs, you will go into so called "dependency-hell" where you need another program because the other is depending on that etc etc, never ending loop
Now when we have apt-get, everything is so easy and nice.. just apt-get install and it automatically downloads all dependencies too :)
